entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
